ValidationRule.description: Force users to populate the Follow Up Date field, when specific Status values are chosen.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" ), (ISNULL(Follow_Up_Date__c)), (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, ''))), ( (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending PAC Review - New Notice Received'))) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Closed in PAC - Communicated Findings to Client'))) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending PAC Review - Transferring New to D/E'))) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending PAC Review - Reassign to New ORR'))) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Closed in PAC - Field to Relay Findings to Client'))) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Closed in PAC - No Communication Necessary'))) ), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a value in the Follow Up Date field with this specific Status
